website_summaries.verdict: Good source of protein snacks, as each meat stick has only 100 calories.
pros: Lower sodium levels than some other beef meat stick products
Free of artificial preservatives and uses grass-fed beef that's free of hormones and antibiotics
Multiple flavor options, so you can find your favorite
cons: Has an odd texture compared to some other brands of meat sticks

customer_reviews.title: Great snacks - Beef and Turkey
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy the CHOMPS sticks from TJ because they are cheaper than Amazon. With the deal, I end up buying multiple packs since I love the snacks. In my opinion, the beef sticks are better testing than the turkey sticks. Both are very good and I alternate them. I eat them as part of a low-calorie diet. The sticks I received from Amazon are tasting fresher that TJ's. My advice is to buy them every time you can find them on a daily deal. For regular consumption, if you have a TJ in your town, go and buy them from there and save at least 10-15%.
customer_reviews.author: Raz

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Awful! I took a gamble when there were good and bad reviews. I regret buying these and can’t return them. I wanted jerky sticks that didn’t have sugar because I’m keto but these are not what I hoped they’d be. I’ve tried Vermont sticks and they are so much better but still have several ingredients I shouldn’t have. The texture of these is all wrong. They are kinda a congealed texture. Just not good. Trust the bad reviews and stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Mom_of_Lil1

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I got a box of these as a reward and I wasn’t expecting much from them. I don’t write reviews very often but these things are amazing! They are a lot thinker than slim Jim’s and a little softer (they don’t have a snap to them). I am 100% ok with that however as they taste REALLY fresh. They do not have a strong flavor (which might be a downside to some), and are more of a light pepper taste. I just wish they were a little more economically priced.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Levy

customer_reviews.title: Bland, bland, bland
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing "wrong" with these beef sticks. If you are purchasing them because they are compliant with a certain diet then you will most likey be happy. The problem is if you aren't in need of anything specific and you just want a great tasting beef stick. If that's your aim then skip these and keep looking. These are the blandest beef sticks that I have ever tasted. My family and I like jerky and eat many different kinds. We were all very disappointed with the flavor profile of these sticks. There isn't much, dare I say if any, flavoring in these. For the price, I don't think these are a worth it. Definitely will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Working Mom

customer_reviews.title: Opened seal and moldy sticks
customer_reviews.text: My first box was delicious and I was so happy to have found a grass fed beef stick that I like, so I ordered two more boxes. One of the boxes had an open seal and the sticks inside were moldy, as pictured. I never like to leave bad reviews, but being that the issue here is potential food poisoning, I felt it was necessary. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: An honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Graying meat? Ew. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Decent price, great flavor, but wholly unappetizing appearance. I’ve ordered this product before, and the sticks had a fresh taste and appearance. These are inconsistent in color, not to mention GRAY. If I were to shop for these in-store, I would not have chosen to purchase. Due to a no return/exchange policy, I’m out $20. Get it together, Chomps. No one wants to eat a graying beef stick. Photo: Far left is normal color, middle and right are off-color.
customer_reviews.author: Not Your Charlie, Dean.

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when I was on the Whole30 diet because I was in dire need of some snacks to keep me on track with the program. While I read many mixed reviews regarding this product, I still had to try it for myself. While I was on the Whole30 diet, I found this beef stick to be edible and satisfied my cravings which is a win! However, I had some left over after I finished the Whole30 and went back to it after eating "normal" again. It was not the same because my taste buds have changed. Overall, this item is great to satisfy cravings and diet restrictions but I don't recommend it as a favorite snack.
customer_reviews.author: QP.Doll

customer_reviews.title: Neither overly spicey or greasy
customer_reviews.text: A lot of times when you eat a beef stick your mouth will feel greasy afterwards. Not here. Another worry for some people is that there will be too much pepper. Again, not with these. I am doing a no carb diet and this gets me by till the next meal. Will likely order again.
customer_reviews.author: John Myler

customer_reviews.title: Pure beefy goodness
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these twice now. I was initially interested in them because they are gluten and sugar free and are from grass fed beef. I like them! They have a little bit of a kick to them. A little bit of spice. Good flavor! If you are looking for a good protein source and are avoiding added sugars (like me), try these. They're good!
customer_reviews.author: KJ the Science Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good!
customer_reviews.text: In my effort to find an pretty healthy jerky, I stumbled across chomps. I have only tried the beef flavor as that as adventurous as I can get. My family and I like them and will continue to order them. They taste good, have good ingredients and no sugar. I have been told there are other healthier ones out there but for now I am satisfied with these and not willing to switch. They come fresh and are quick to take with us on road trips, hiking, kayaking, etc. I hope to venture out to other flavors some time soon but for now I am pleased with beef.
customer_reviews.author: fatcatprincess

customer_reviews.title: No added sugar - perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious! I was searching for a sugar free beef stick and found these originally at Whole Foods. I was so pleased to come home and find them on Amazon. It is virtually impossible to find a beef stick with no added sugars - and that taste good. At only 100 calories for a substantial stick, I’m in love. I always have one on me for emergency blood sugar lows or just when you are hungry and there’s nothing “good for you” to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma Harper

customer_reviews.title: So Yummy!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! I'm on the Keto diet right now and these are perfect for curbing hunger without adding carbs. The texture is great, the flavor is there, and the best part is no carbs. I wish there was a spicier version that also has no carbs, but I'm sure that'll happen eventually. I had been buying these from Trader Joe's, but I don't have one in my area, but being able to buy them online is a life changer. Now I just need to try the other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Daarkcloud

customer_reviews.title: So much better then a protein bar
customer_reviews.text: I know so many are into protein bars for a pick me up but so many of them contain sugar and are high in carbs. I read about these and bought one at trader Joe's. OMG they are good and don't have the carbs and sugar. Of course had to check Amazon and price was so much better..paid 1.97 Each at Trader Joe's. I toss one in my purse when I am out running errands.. They have a nice little spice and are such a nice protein boost
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Too soft, & much too salty beef sticks!
customer_reviews.text: Found these beef sticks to be too soft and needing to be dehydrated more, also they have more of a salty taste than a beef taste. Trying other beef sticks I found Rolets beef chewy to taste best and they have a smoked flavor that makes them taste just right without the overwhelming taste of salt as with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Halcoh

customer_reviews.title: A Pantry Staple
customer_reviews.text: I love these when I have been working from home all day, back to back calls and no time to make a proper meal in between or when I am on the go all weekend, these are a dream so you don't eat crap. I have stocked our pantry and will continue to with a variety of flavors. It helps teach kids there are healthy alternatives for energy too. Thanks for making such a great product. Flavor is great, size is perfect for adults or split between 2 kids easily.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that these beef sticks aren't too tough to chew especially when you bite into them like others I've tried. The only small thing I dislike about them is that they are a little peppery tasting but I won't drop a star because of that. What matters to me is the quality and that there are no preservatives added. They are easy to bite into and easy to chew. I grab a slice of Sargento medium cheddar cheese and eat it with the beef sticks. They taste great together!
customer_reviews.author: TRose

customer_reviews.title: Champs are the healthy version of the old standard meat stick!
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the healthiest meat stocks you can get your hands on. They are fresh, have a good bite and texture. I really like that it wasn’t loaded with garlic and onion which stays on your breath. My wife is gluten sensitive, so these meet that requirement. They just look so much less like the old, diet decimating stock from gas stations, the expectation may leave you a little disappointed. The quality, and health protein amounts, are interchangeable with hard boiled eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T.

customer_reviews.title: filling and healthy snack for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my son's lunch box or as an after school snack for him! He's gluten and dairy free so sometimes it's hard to find good quality snacks that will sustain him for that after school period before lessons/practices. I also love to eat one before hiking, it fills me up just enough to give me the energy/stamina i need. Love that they're not too "spicy" for my kiddo too! he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of boys

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Grass-Fed Beef Stick
customer_reviews.text: I've tried quite a few different sticks from grass-fed animal proteins, and this is my favorite to keep tucked in my purse in case I'm caught hungry away from my kitchen. I feel like I'm cheating on a healthy diet, but they aren't a cheat!!
customer_reviews.author: ReasercherRose

customer_reviews.title: Great filler, no additives, perfec snack
customer_reviews.text: One thing we learned being on keto, is to ensure you take a look at the ingredients to ensure there are no "hidden" additives. Everything in Chomps ingredient list screams quality and simplicity. The taste is very "beefy", and unlike many other competitors no taste of any preservatives. Makes for a great mid-morning/afternoon snack. Also good is that when you buy in bulk the unit price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe R. Mationg

customer_reviews.title: Chomps are Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure how Chomps would taste but I was willing to try them since they are not full of chemicals, are made from sustainably and humanely sourced beef and turkey. I was absolutely Amazed at the wonderful taste and texture of Chomps. I wanted to find a healthy source of quick protein that I did't have to prepare before eating and this is the perfect choice. I plan to always have a good supply of Chomps in my cupboard from now on! The world needs more products like Chomps, thank you guys for a much needed replacement for what should always have been a good snack!
customer_reviews.author: pennyoga

customer_reviews.title: My go to protein snack
customer_reviews.text: These beef sticks are my go to snack. I always carry them in my purse, car and especially my backpack gear. I follow the Whole 30 program and they really help when I'm out somewhere that doesn't have a lot of healthy choices on the menu (i.e. fast food places). I can order a salad and add a chomp stick for a protein source. I'm at clients a lot and work through lunch occasionally so one of these with a That's It bar works as a quick meal. I give these 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Debra M. Butz

customer_reviews.title: Very good. A bit more expensive than what you can buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Lets get the price bit out of the way. You pay for convenience on Amazon, no doubt about it. These are $1.69 a piece at Trader Joe's at the checkout sections. That makes a 10 pack $16.90. Even on sale right now they are $17.99, so about 11 cents more a stick. Not a bank breaker, but I just found this out today so making you all aware as well. That said, great, yummer, shelf stable, zero carb snacks. Love em.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S

customer_reviews.title: No sugar, nitrates, or other unwanted stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dogs. All of the other so-called dog treats contain who knows what and are sourced from who knows where. I feel more comfortable them eating these than anything made for pets. With all of the recalls and not knowing whether pet food/treat ingredients are sourced from China or filled with antibiotics or euthanasia drugs, my dogs very seldom eat food manufactured for pets. It's a little expensive but cheaper in the end than veterinary bills, operations, cancer treatments, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinestate

customer_reviews.title: we love chomps!
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase this product from another site. Saw these on subscribe and save and got super excited. We love this brand. It’s a quick and easy way to get some protein in, these sticks taste great. My kids love them in their lunchbox (easy to open) and I don’t have to worry about them eating junk. Clean ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2thePookiesx3

customer_reviews.title: My go to jerky product.
customer_reviews.text: I generally avoid mass produced highly processed foods and purchased this jerky based upon represented ingredient list and recommendations. I am on my third order. The taste is not as spicy as most, but i think that is because the jerky does not rely on chemicals. The product taste and quality is consistent. I know my stomach and body feel better after eating then when try the bigger name mass produced jerky.
customer_reviews.author: Knuck56

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth the price and taste!
customer_reviews.text: With a strict diet with no processed foods, sugar, or unhealthy fats, these chomp sticks were a life saver! Many reviews state a lot of negative feedback but I’ve so far never have had any issues with chomp sticks (besides my wallet getting thinner, haha). I’ve resorted to the larger chomp stick pack on amazon until recently finding these at a cheaper price at Trader Joe’s. My favorite chomp stick by rank: 1) Jalepeno Beef 2) Beef 3) Turkey. I have not tried any others so unable to rank!
customer_reviews.author: Malorie

customer_reviews.title: Good size beef sticks and lots of flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a bunch of Keto snacks to try out and these are one of my favs. They are a decent size compared to others I ordered, have a lot of flavor and you can taste the beef in them compared to others that have more spices in them. I added to my monthly subscription order as I want to have these in the house for a healthy snack!
customer_reviews.author: RomeroM

customer_reviews.title: So yummy!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are seriously amazing! Such a good flavor! Very mildly spicy which makes them extra yummy. I only ordered one box for a road trip and I wished that I had ordered more. I love that the ingredients are clean, yet these taste so much better than the “junk food” jerkies and beef sticks. My kids all loved them too. I will definitely be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's the fact that I'm starving and am just now trying these for the first time (I couldn't even wait to get home as I'm literally sitting in the UPS store parking lot where I get my mail lol!) but these are AMAZING! They're full of flavor, have a nice snappy casing and great consistency. Better than the Nick's sticks I've been ordering on Amazon as those are hit or miss on quality. I think I might have another one on my way home
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: A Delicious, High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying these sticks. They are very flavorful without being too spicy or sweet as I have encountered with other brands. I especially like that the beef is grass fed and there are no ingredients that I can't pronounce. I can't eat one without my dog staring down my throat until I give her a little piece. Sasha says, "Two paws up!"
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flavor missing something
customer_reviews.text: These meat sticks are not as good as others I have tried (i.e. Vermont Barbacue). I could only eat two - they were fatty tasting.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dolby

customer_reviews.title: Delicious beef jerky sticks you can feel good about eating!
customer_reviews.text: As a registered dietitian who follows a low-carb diet based on whole food, I highly recommend CHOMPS beef jerky snack sticks. These delicious sticks are made from high-quality grass-fed beef and stay shelf stable at room temperature for several months, so they're great to keep in your pantry, handbag or backpack, as well as being ideal for travel. Definitely check them out if you haven't already -- I'm sure you'll become a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Franziska Spritzler

customer_reviews.title: Keto friendly is hard to find...Chomps nailed it
customer_reviews.text: I read an article about keto friendly snacks and tried a variety of the items in the article. Chomps being one of the products and my husband and I love them. We had a slight snafu with one of our orders having broken seals on the box but the company replaced them no problem. They taste great and I love that they are made of grass fed beef. Delicious! Will order again and again.
customer_reviews.author: SL Frink

customer_reviews.title: Has a FISHY aftertaste, yuck!
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is kind of bland but that's not the worst part. This beef stick leaves a fishy aftertaste in your mouth for a significant amount of time. I have never had a beef product that made me want to wash my mouth as much as this.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Yummm
customer_reviews.text: We love Chomps! It’s a quick protein snack with great flavor. Much better than beef Jerky. I buy them for my fireman husband who needs a quick snack on busy fire days. But i also love them! This time I ordered the beef sticks but got a variety pack of all the flavors! Not the worst thing that could have happened because we got to try the other flavors. We love these things and will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Not that great.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand how these are reviewed so high. I got the original and they didn't taste very good. The color on them was a light pinkish, not like beef. I ordered these and another brand to try at the same time and the other brand was much better. I ended up giving these to my Husky.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Gross taste, gross texture
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these AIP/keto friendly CHOMPS. I like the turkey flavor enough -- though after eating one, your breath is disgustingly pungent from the strong black pepper -- but the "original beef" flavor is disgusting. The fats congeal inside the package, leaving a slimy texture as well. The beef ones are a must-miss, while the convenience and middling taste of the turkey flavor might convince me to purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Gonewiththe

customer_reviews.title: Best meat stick on the market
customer_reviews.text: Chomp is aptly named, as you won't stop chomping these delicious treats. The seasoning is just about perfect - neiither bland nor overly salted, with a hint of spice and no added sugar. Each stick is individually wrapped. My order arrived quickly. Unlike other similar products, each stick was fresh. The texture makes for pleasurable chewing.
customer_reviews.author: Somer Teleo

customer_reviews.title: Love Chomps, just not this flavor
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE the turkey sticks. I mistakenly thought I would also love the beef based on that and purchased this. The taste left much to be desired to me. I do have a picky palate. I gave away to co workers. They seemed to enjoy them. They made me think of gas station beef sticks with the taste, but I don't get that with the turkey for some odd reason!
customer_reviews.author: A Tack

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!! You won't regret...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE CHOMPS Paleo jerky! The flavor is outstanding and so are the ingredients. The jerky is juicy and flavorful... I found out the company was having a sale and immediately went to their direct website and bought more. I keep some at work and in my gym bag for a quick pick me up on the go! Also, I love that there is ZERO SUGAR! This is definitely a product and a company I can stand behind.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Adult and toddler approved
customer_reviews.text: My family is Gluten free and we love these beef sticks. My toddler requests them as a snack almost daily. They aren't salty or spicy and satisfy your hunger when you are on the go and have no time to eat. I often eat them in the car between my kids' activities and my kids do too! Thank you for making these without sugar and all the ick most beef sticks have. This beef stick is my favorite and my husband loves the jalapeño ones! We give it 5 stars and 6 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Fit mom

customer_reviews.title: Leaves pasty gunk residue each bite and way too salty tasting
customer_reviews.text: Took one bite and totally regretted it. Took a couple more just to confirm that every bite left a coating of a gross feeling and tasting type of fat on roof of mouth. It’s like the fat you eat on a medium rare cooked cheap steak that doesn’t totally break down and soften up and will liquefy in your mouth. Instead it is a pasty gunk that doesn’t taste so good. Lastly, it’s too salty. Overtakes the meat flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Fresh tasting and great for my paleo diet
customer_reviews.text: I always have one or two of these in my bag in case I get hungry. Taste very good and very handy. If I don't have time for a real meal, i'll often have one of these to tide me over and keep from feeling hungry. I've ordered numerous times and always had great quality product. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: RogerWilco

customer_reviews.title: Awesome snack for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I heard of this brand from a vlogger who recommended this product as a go to when she needed a wholesome, tasty snack when she was too busy to make one. Was she ever right! I have tried the beef & the turkey both are so good, even better with a cheese stick if really hungry!
customer_reviews.author: SD FarmMom

customer_reviews.title: Your meat is my treat
customer_reviews.text: I always keep a supply of CHOMPS meat sticks in my pantry. I first fell in love with CHOMPS because it was a grass fed product and did not contain all that junk. My kids love it because it is their protein source when they pack lunches or pack a snack in between soccer games or whatever activity.
customer_reviews.author: jthomato

customer_reviews.title: Best Jerky I’ve Had Yet
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the BEST beef jerky I’ve ever had. The ingredients, taste and freshness surpass anything I tasted from natural brands to the old overly processed crap I remember as a kid. It’s my go-to snack when I’m on the run on or out for the day with my wife (instead of some power bars). I’ve even cut it up and mixed with scrambled eggs. I don’t eat much beef as a rule, so this satisfies the occasional red meat craving. I mostly eat the turkey, but both are amazingly satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Orodenker

customer_reviews.title: These are really tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a tasty low-sugar snack to keep me away from the candy aisle. I was hesitant about ordering these because I've tried some beef snacks in the past that were basically inedible because they just tasted disgusting. I've had to resort to making my own beef jerky if I wanted a good-tasting high-protein snack. I've already eaten two of these CHOMPS beef sticks since opening the box this morning. They're delicious! I'll be ordering more when I start running low on these.
customer_reviews.author: Joy L. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of 10!
customer_reviews.text: Picture a slim jim, only not as good, and leaves a weird coating in your mouth. "All around f****** terrible" is the quote from my friend who split a stick with me. Can I send back 9 of them?
customer_reviews.author: Dave L.

customer_reviews.title: Great on the whole 30!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a quick snack after a workout and grabbed one of these. I needed something that didn't have sugar, so I found this. I felt like it had a good taste, a little salty, but what can you expect with no sugar. It was chewy and very comparable to a slim jim, but with a cleaner, less greasy taste. I'd def. buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: SOFT TEXTURE AND NOT OVERLY SALTY
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these because they were soft and flavorful without being ultra salty. Love the fact that they are grass fed and all natural. Also liked the fact that the outer casing comes off easily so if you are like me that don't enjoy eating the casing you don't have. Would definitely buy these in the other flavors that were offered - I ordered original.
customer_reviews.author: BellaNonna

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients if you're keto
customer_reviews.text: These are so tasty! I take them to work and leave them there for a quick, no mess, no-need-to-heat-up, doesn't need refrigerating lunch. Very easy and I don't have to worry about added sugar or carbs with it. One stick and I'm good for at least 6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: EJ Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  A MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best beef jerky stick I’ve ever had not even close. Product is very clean and tastes absolutely amazing. Also not firm or hard to chew at all. Great treat to throw in a gym bag, on the go, or just hanging out. Get these ASAP and enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: Schredda

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: I'm on the whole30 diet and I like to snack. I've tried a few compliant snacks and they sometimes lack in flavor and carry a weird texture. NOT THESE! These are delicious meat stick snackies. I feel like I'm eating a healthy and less greasy slimjim. I happen to enjoy slimjims so if you do too, try these. Packs the protein too so I like to eat them before a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Too Alpo-ish
customer_reviews.text: Nutrition wise they are great. However, the taste is bland and slightly reminiscent of how Alpo smells. Also, the texture is mushy and unappealing. I might see about buying an individual stick of jalapeno to see how the flavor and texture is.
customer_reviews.author: Neil.

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: I love the ingredients in these sticks, and how good they taste. They taste like any regular beef jerky, and they don't leave that fatty film in your mouth. I like knowing that I am putting good quality ingredients in my body versus all of those nasty preservatives and ingredients found in other processed foods. Thank you Chomps for making a good quality beef stick.
customer_reviews.author: Erv31

customer_reviews.title: Whole30 approved and the Kid in me agrees
customer_reviews.text: I tried a sampler of items and came to the conclusion I like regular beef! Kid in me says "Slim Jim!" And the adult in me says "Better than that.... Chomps!" I love that there is no sugar and t keeps all the healthy suggestions the W30 people impose... this is a pick me up that actually gives me energy (protein) without hidden sugars, andn no weird stuff!
customer_reviews.author: MartysReads

customer_reviews.title: Subscribe and Save customer disappointed 😔 for the first time!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th order and this has been a snack for my kids while home during quarantine. However, after wiping down the contents of my package, I was surprised to find the safety seal on the Chomps box cut 😳. To make matters worse this item cannot be returned 🤔 so I take the loss. I will be unsubscribing since I don’t have $20 to give away...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delish
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my son to keep in his apartment so he’ll always have something to eat when he gets home from work late at night. Well... He likes them much I think I’m going to have to order him some more, as these aren’t going to last very long. He says they’re “deLISH” and a good size. He says he definitely recommends them. :)
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Super bland
customer_reviews.text: Overall bought as a friend recommended. Wants a healthy snack with low calories for traveling. Overall they are eh on taste. Extremely bland for me. Was hoping for more just due to the price and cost. Only ate two bites and threw away. I’ll have to give the rest to my friend I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Go PSU

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping Delicious Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for Whole30 eaters and just in general. It is nicely single packaged for you to conveniently throw in a purse or backpack. For work, hiking or camping or for vacations where you just need a quick snack, this is amazing. I've tried the original beef flavor and the Italian meatball flavor and both are delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Taste good and not greasy
customer_reviews.text: I love beef jerky but was never a fan of meat sticks because all I ever found was slim Jim’s which needless to say don’t even seem like meat. I decided to give CHOMPS a try and am happy to say the are pretty good! They are flavorful, sized perfectly for a protein packed snack, portable, and not greasy. I have only tried the regular beef so far but will be trying other flavors soon.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: good food
customer_reviews.text: I thought the product had a good taste albeit a bit unusual as it is without all the spices like the other brands. Nevertheless, good food without all the chemicals. Other family members found it excellent food. Well worth rebuying.
customer_reviews.author: goezy007

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: The flavor isn’t bad. A little artificial tasting. I wish it tasted more like real beef. The texture is also a bit artificial. My 5-year-old son loves it though. He ate almost all of the beef sticks, so I guess it’s a hit or miss. Based on the high price though, I probably wouldn’t buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jheneya

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting and felt healthier
customer_reviews.text: Tasty and good sustenance for hiking trips. Slightly spicy for kids but my 7 year old daughter was able to tolerate (along with a little bit of bread). She liked it enough to ask for another one each hiking trip.
customer_reviews.author: asen

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased these because I thought they would be a great protein filled snack! I couldn’t believe 9g of protein were in this stick! I was also pleasantly surprised that each stick was a bit bigger than I thought they would be in the picture. I found them to have a great flavor. Overall I was very pleased. I think they are a bit expensive but also well worth it for all that you are getting!
customer_reviews.author: Greg L

customer_reviews.title: Great product - healthy protein that really helps during a hike, bike ride and a run.
customer_reviews.text: The complete family enjoys Chomps and it really does help in these times. Individual wrapping and just a healthy snack that can easily be stored and shared at anytime. I recommend the turkey and beef sticks.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Peters

customer_reviews.title: You get in what you put out. Great product worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: The beef sticks taste great and no filler no chemicals etc. I have been on keto for 6 months and these jerky sticks work perfect for long car trips or a pick me up before work outs. Also my wife loves them as well. You get in what you get out and I was tired of over priced jerkey full of chemicals. Chomps is truly a great product and is worth it in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan williams

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely DELISH!
customer_reviews.text: Having seen advertisement for this product on three different platforms, I knew that I needed to try it out. Once you open the packaging of CHOMPS, you know that you are going to be eating something that is clean and extraordinary. There is no strong salty smell or taste, just yumminess that is unlike any other beef jerky sticks. Honestly, I don't know how else to explain the taste but that is it CLEAN: clean on my palette, clean in smell, clean overall experience. Lastly, I love that I am supporting a small business and hope them continued success in this endeavor of theirs.
customer_reviews.author: MamaPadilla

customer_reviews.title: Beef Sticks were pale color. Unappetizing look.
customer_reviews.text: Was tasting them the first time tasted ok but not sure what the taste was suppose to be. I just couldn't get over they way they looked. Being a pale gray color it just unappetizing did not want to finish them. I did email the company and they said every batch can be different in color shade. When I look at other pictures mine does not look the same. Maybe this is normal coloring for this product but to me its unappetizing and I will not be being this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kim

customer_reviews.title: Life saver grab n go!
customer_reviews.text: These are a lifesaver. I am on a very very strict diet. These are one of the few things that pass. I can grab them and go.. keep them on me incase I am unable to eat anything while I am out. I do wish there were better flavor options. They kinda give me hotdog breath (as per my husband)...
customer_reviews.author: Erynn

customer_reviews.title: A Great Jerky Snack!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried the Italian and these (Original Beef). I liked both but prefer this one. Just good old fashioned jerky taste. Not too salty, not too spicy. It's just right! I put them on Amazon Subscribe so I always have them available.
customer_reviews.author: mmays

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best beef sticks I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I came across this beef stick while doing a round of Whole30 and thought why not? The reviews were good, the price on subscribe and save was cheaper than at the store, and I felt like it was worth trying. They are definitely the best beef stick I've ever had--soft and chewy at the same time, with a nice "snap" when you bite into it. It also doesn't taste artificial like a lot of the other sticks/jerkies I've tried over the years do. Pricy for what it is, but I'd rather pay a couple cents more per stick and actually really enjoy the snack.
customer_reviews.author: danda57

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FLAVOR
customer_reviews.text: YES THESE ARE EXPENSIVE BUT IF YOU CAN AFFORD IT THEN YOU SHOULD TRY THEM. WE HAVE TRIED ALL THE FLAVORS, SOME ARE NOT GOOD. THE BASICS ARE GREAT THOUGH. THE SEA SALT ONE IS GREAT IF YOU HAVE A SALTY TOOTH :)
customer_reviews.author: ccovey

customer_reviews.title: Best Beef Stick Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I love beef sticks but quit eating them years ago because of all the harmful stuff in them. With Chomps, you know exactly what you're eating...just a few of the very best ingredients possible and only 100 nutricious calories per stick. After eating the first one, I immediately added them to my monthly Subscribe and Save order.
customer_reviews.author: SandyB.

customer_reviews.title: Old?
customer_reviews.text: Product date good but item tasted terrible (old) and although the same package, was way lighter than the same product purchased a Trader Joe's. Unable to return so had to throw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas Hedman

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Whole30 & Gluten Free snack
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time to order Chomps. This beef stick is not only easy for on-the-go moments (full-time working mom of four!) but it tastes really good, too. Sometimes I find sticks to be a little tough to chew but not with these. The only problem is hiding them from the rest of the house so they don't eat my sticks. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lori S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack
customer_reviews.text: Chomps is the best choice for a clean ingredient snack. It’s a great protein pick-me-up and it’s so convenient to throw into a purse or bag. The flavor is great and tasty! It’s my go-to snack for at home or in the go.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beef snacks!
customer_reviews.text: I never heard about grass fed beef until I began IF and low carb dieting. So I was amazed I could have Chomps beef sticks made with grass fed beef as the main ingredient! Tasty and so many varieties!
customer_reviews.author: Sharpy

customer_reviews.title: Hangry No More
customer_reviews.text: These are great for snacking or staving off hunger (and the grumps of being hungry even without realizing it). I picked up a couple of these at the grocery store after I ordered them via Amazon. This is NOT a Slim Jim. There is no greasy texture, mouth feel, etc. There is a bit of a snap which I like but could have a bit more. I ordered the original and it is quite peppery so if you are spice sensitive, beware of that. I tried the Jalepeno flavor from the grocery store and found it less spicy and overall, am quite happy to find this 100 calorie, no sugar, no weird chemical taste, easy to transport hit of protein.
customer_reviews.author: Caltam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my emergency snack pack
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Go-Bag (emergency) I tried one and I’m Hooked! Can’t wait to try the other flavors . Good for a year but didn’t last the week....need to restock for me and for my bag.
customer_reviews.author: VT67

customer_reviews.title: The Best Beef Sticks I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: Forget the fact that these sticks are for a low-carb diet—they are the best tasting beef sticks I've ever had! Nothing else even comes close! The ingredients list is simple and the flavor is incredible. I definitely will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: David Padfield

customer_reviews.title: Sent these for Valentine's Day!
customer_reviews.text: We sent the original flavor to our son at college for Valentine's Day. He loved them! We got an immediate response and a picture from him saying that it was the perfect gift! He is an RA at school and may have shared with his roommate or guys on the floor, but I doubt it! Just the right size too.
customer_reviews.author: Marias

customer_reviews.title: Discolored! Quality control issues. Buy at your own risk!
customer_reviews.text: Received some discolored, although they were months away from expiration. Decided to throw them out rather than risk getting sick. Quality control is an issue. I should have listened to the other reviews which said the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu M.

customer_reviews.title: Grass fed, grass finished beef sticks
customer_reviews.text: Other similar products have a really fatty consistency that I did not like. Chomps Beef Jerky sticks have a better consistency and flavor. Many also promote their products come from "grass-fed" beef, but it is also important that it is grass-finished.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen O

customer_reviews.title: Great quick snack!
customer_reviews.text: Great snack to keep in the car, at work or in the backpack. I enjoy the mild spicy/smoky flavor and find these will satisfy between meal cravings without the sugar or other junk found in most snacks bars.
customer_reviews.author: Ted S.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Was not expecting something this good. Very satisfying and not artificial tasting at all (although why I am I surprised- the ingredients are listed and all natural!). Nice size. Will definitely keep in stock (especially when doing whole 30!!)
customer_reviews.author: Tunamuffin

customer_reviews.title: Savory and meaty!
customer_reviews.text: Meaty! Moist! Chewy but not tough! Savory, not sweet and exactly what I wanted. These taste like quality meat snacks. I feel like I’m getting what I paid for. Will buy again and recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. M

customer_reviews.title: No flavor
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of a healthier alternative to regular beef sticks, but there is no flavor at all. I might try the teriyaki or other flavors, but the I will pass on original flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Rhyno

customer_reviews.title: Yummmmmm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 flavors. Original, mild Italian, and Venison. Our family liked the Venison by far and that will be our repeat purchase order. FYI found your product through Code Red Lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty, very filling, No adverse reactions
customer_reviews.text: CHOMPS Grass Fed Beef Jerky is a Great snack with no adverse physical reactions! I love the flavor, it was a bit spicier than I expected but not over the top. It costs a little more than others but for the simple ingredients and great flavor, it's worth it. I wished I could find them in stores near me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine suggested these when I was trying to find snacks for my family and I. They are SO GOOD! They are also filling, I usually eat half of one so next time I’ll probably get the smaller but they are so good and the ingredients are top notch! Will definitely be purchasing regularly!
customer_reviews.author: Jac1528

customer_reviews.title: Great for keto terrible taste
customer_reviews.text: These have great nutritional profile especially if you're on a keto diet but it's the most blandest meat snack I've tasted. I will not be purchasing ever again.. for $20 I can buy a large amount of steak and make my own jerky.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I'm really glad I found these!
customer_reviews.text: I finally found jerky with no sugar! These taste great and are not too spicy (I can barely handle black pepper on my food, so I really don't like spicy food). It's a great salty/savory snack to keep you going with no additives, whether you are dieting or trying to eat healthier. I also found these at Trader Joe's the other day and bought some from there, too.
customer_reviews.author: wakegirl

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally eat "beef sticks" but these are really tasty and a great snack when you are on The Whole 30. they don't taste fake & are not too many calories. I do think they are a bit pricey. We ordered the 10 pack to start in case we didn't like them, but we do!
customer_reviews.author: thiltpold

customer_reviews.title: Tasty snack
customer_reviews.text: These beef sticks are great. Lots of flavor and a good amount of protein. The perfect snack. My kids love them too. I ordered the full size sticks and the mini sticks. The mini sticks are perfect for lunches.
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: High quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically to keep in my cockpit for when I was too busy to stop for lunch. They taste quite good and I was very happy about the quality of the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Davey

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great taste
customer_reviews.text: These have been super handy to have for those times when you start to get hungry in the later afternoon but there's still a few hours before dinner. I like the flavor and find it's just enough to keep me from reaching for the unhealthy carbs.
customer_reviews.author: wave om

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor, have reordered twice and shared with family
customer_reviews.text: Perfect snack size and calorie count, my niece uses them for snacks at athletic events instead of the usual sugary things they offer. They are a little on the spicy side but I drink plenty of water with them so not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: K. Martin

customer_reviews.title: So Good!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! The whole family loves them! I have to sneak away to eat one alone or else my children attack me for it. Great product and perfect for my celiac gluten free/ type 1 diabetic child.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: CHOMPS Grass Fed Beef Jerky Meat Snack Sticks, Keto, Whole30 Approved, Paleo, Low Carb, High Protein, Gluten Free, Sugar Free, Non-GMO, Nitrate Free, 90 Calories 1.15 Oz, Original Beef 10 Pack
feature_bullets: CLEAN SNACK - Each 1.15oz meat stick has 9g of protein, low sodium, low fat, low carb, sugar free & only 90 calories
DIET APPROVED - Our jerky sticks are Keto Friendly, Whole30 Approved, Paleo, Non-GMO, Certified Gluten Free
ALLERGEN FRIENDLY – All natural, real ingredients that are dairy free, soy free, nut free, gluten free, sugar free
ON-THE-GO, QUALITY PROTEIN - Our beef is 100% Grass Fed & Finished, Certified Humane, and nitrate nitrite free
DELICIOUS TASTE - Original Beef features the same savory taste that made us popular: slightly smoky, slightly spicy

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
